question:
Is the following statement something you would say?
"I do not believe that Jesus Christ is the Son of God"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Jesus was God who came to Earth as a human being, died for our sins and was resurrected on the third day"

Choices:
 (A) Yes
 (B) No

Is the following statement something you would say?
"There is no god, and Jesus is not the son of God"

 (A) No
 (B) Yes
